entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tracking issue for remaining AssemblyBuilder.Save work in .NET 9 #92975
    9.0.0
  • What really defines the result of typeof(MyType).GetHashCode()? #92973
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator should have better docs and public API #92972
  • .Net 8 RC1 Regression: error BLAZORSDK1001: Unable to find '{dll list}' to be lazy loaded later. Confirm that project or package references are included and the reference is used in the project. #92965
  • Missing Microsoft.Extensions.* package README files #92963
  • [API Proposal]: Support true singletons through IServiceCollection #92957
  • Rename `server.socket.address` to `network.peer.address` and add `network.peer.port` #92956
    8.0.0
  • illink - Task host node exited prematurely #92951
  • consider running all libraries unit tests with bogus machine culture #92949
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TestCheckChildProcessUserAndGroupIds failing Subset assertion #92944
  • [QUIC] Document asyn exceptions #92943
    9.0.0
  • ChangeDocumentationFileForPackaging causes incremental build issues inside VS #92940
    9.0.0
  • JIT/SIMD/CircleInConvex_[r]/[ro] are failing on arm64 Mono interpreter #92925
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #92942
  • X509Certificate2Collection.Import() fails with Internal.Cryptography.CryptoThrowHelper+WindowsCryptographicException: An internal error occurred #92921
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Change `System.String..ctor(System.SByte*)` et all to use UTF-8 on Windows #92919
  • Rename `dns.lookupS.duration` to `dns.lookup.duration` #92917
    8.0.0

Closed

  • crossgen2.pdb not found on disk for Build Installer Build and Test coreclr freebsd_x64 Release #92961
  • Spec update for Thread.Name property #85635
    8.0.0
  • NativeAot isinst branch trimming #92850
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_float_1_r/expl_float_1_r.dll #92382
    9.0.0
  • Update SOS to show the relevant information for the `!ThreadPool` command when using the Windows thread pool #90443
    8.0.0
  • CI failure: The file crossgen2.pdb to be packed was not found on disk. #92930
  • Task host node exited prematurely #92950
  • [Test failure] System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TestCheckChildProcessUserAndGroupIds #92945
  • Configuration Binding Generator Fails to Generate Required Method #92771
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonElement.TryGetDouble() succeeds when the value is not representable as a double #92631
  • `QuicConnection.ConnectAsync` raises `SocketException` when host not found #78751
    8.0.0
  • API Discussion: HttpContent #91111
  • `DynamicallyAccessedMembersAnalyzer` throws for `InlineArrayAccessOperation` #88684
    9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Zero SIMD vectors with movi on arm64 #92873
    9.0.0
  • [TestFailure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors(url: "https://wrong.host.badssl.com") #85329
    9.0.0
  • Excessive zero extension #92887
    9.0.0
  • Filter keywords are silently dropped when the provider name is '*' #12199
    Future
  • Private method on EventSource failed manifest construction #12200
    Future
  • 8.0 Performance regression #92530

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] CI: runtime-wasm-perf: disable for PRs #92978
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] CI: runtime-wasm-perf: disable for PRs #92977
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, needs-area-label
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix the path for crossgen2 for the outerloop cg2 legs #92971
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #92970
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #92969
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasm] WBT inner loop improvements #92968
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Entitle macOS executables while building #92967
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Replace CMake Object Interfaces with CMake 3.20 Objects #92966
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing perf pipeline #92964
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0] Fixes not find assembly and pdb if it's not using the default path #92955
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix duplicate file name generated by GenerateHWIntrinsicTests_General.cs #92954
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/8.0] Throw when applying `JsonObjectHandling.Populate` to types with parameterized constructors. #92947
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Merge SIMD stores into wider SIMDs #92939
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CBOR Writer: Use canonical NaN representation for NaN values #92934
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix calling of static delegates with simd arguments #92927
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/8.0] Use invariant culture in CBOR date encoding #92924
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Formats.Cbor, 8.0.0
  • `readonly`-ify fields based on whole program view #92923
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix issue with reflection invoke and pointer types #92922
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #92920
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow experimenting with different CSE subsets #92918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Adding a vectorized implementation of TensorPrimitives.Log #92960
    area-System.Numerics
  • Minimal ILGenerator implementation for new AssemblyBuilder.Save #92846
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TraceSource package readme update #92962
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [wasm] wasmbrowser - change the default webserver port to 0, to randomly select a port #92952
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix illink task lock during live build #92928
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • runtime-wasm-perf: add triggers for PRs #92799
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Expand unaligned address recognition for ARM32 #92938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #92912
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Use intended ports when running `DevServer` #92906
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Disable `TensorPrimitivesTests.ConvertToHalf_SpecialValues` #92953
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Adding Log2 tests covering some special values #92946
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix publishing PGO assets #92958
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't publish crossgen2 as NativeAOT when doing a cross-os build. #92948
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91916
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92495
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Condition the use of NetCoreAppPrevious TFM #92941
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI: Don't trigger runtime pipelines on perf pipeline only changes #92903
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Throw when applying `JsonObjectHandling.Populate` to types with parameterized constructors. #92937
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Make config binding gen incremental (#89587) #92730
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add testing for #92539. #92926
    test-enhancement, area-System.Formats.Cbor, 9.0.0
  • Add analyzer support for inline array access #92736
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm] Use intended ports when running DevServer #92913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • This vectorizes TensorPrimitives.Log2 #92897
    area-System.Numerics
  • Improve throughput / allocations of JsonNode.GetPath #92284
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Merge stores #92852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Arm64 SIMD regs are now zeroed with movi instead of eor #92882
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Simplify and improve reporting of context information #92824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Disable CodeQL in superpmi-collect pipeline #92872
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [infra] Disable failing test on tvos with Native AOT #92893
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Clean up the crossgen2_publish project and local/live packs references #92826
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] [browser][nodejs] keep runtime alive for JSExport calls #92890
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Remove duplicated marshaling of return value for JSExport #92886
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of object scheme #92753
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Use `add_linker_options` and `target_linker_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock::bbJumpKind private #92908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Cleanup iOS scenarios post HybridGlobalization scenario addition #92904
    area-Infrastructure
  • Merge CoreCLR-based official builds legs into one leg per platform #92901
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement overrides for Span and ReadOnlySpan on SslStream #92889
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* APIs #92855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Reorder indirs on arm64 to make them amenable to ldp optimization #92768
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Use specific version of v8 with runtime tests #92845
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Start new per-host queue when an async over sync Dns call is cancelled #92862
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix linux-x64 AOT-llvm perf job #92644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: [ios][tests] Trim on helix for libraries and functional tests on CI #92719
    needs-area-label
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reenable MSVC warnings #92895
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • CI test #92354
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #92864
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Disabled failing tests on Mono Android and interpreter lanes to keep CI green #92728
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support passing negative/positive numbers to methods. #92754
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
